data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gavrilov, Ilya A. (2007): A revision of the mealybug genus Mirococcopsis Borchsenius (Homoptera: Coccinea: Pseudococcidae) based on the structure of the adult females. Zootaxa 1586: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178470
